channel.title: CNBC on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in CNBC on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Moguls’ Must-See TV: ‘Squawk Box’ Is Driving the News Cycle In Trump’s Economy
item.description: In divisive times, the CNBC stalwart has been able to book big guests that almost exclusively appear on Fox News or MSNBC — and its cred among Wall Street titans is rising in its 30th year on air.

item.title: Moguls’ Must-See TV: ‘Squawk Box’ Is Driving the News Cycle In Trump’s Economy
item.description: In divisive times, the CNBC stalwart has been able to book big guests that almost exclusively appear on Fox News or MSNBC — and its cred among Wall Street titans is rising in its 30th year on air.

item.title: ‘NBC Nightly News’ EP Meghan Rafferty Exits to Join Versant
item.description: Rafferty will be vp of news standards, guiding the MSNBC and CNBC news operations once the Versant split is complete.

item.title: ‘NBC Nightly News’ EP Meghan Rafferty Exits to Join Versant
item.description: Rafferty will be vp of news standards, guiding the MSNBC and CNBC news operations once the Versant split is complete.

item.title: CNBC Hires An Editor-In-Chief As It Unifies TV and Digital News Teams
item.description: David Cho, a Washington Post veteran most recently of Barron’s will lead a unified newsroom for the business news outlet.
